name: Text
description: An item used as a non-interactable piece of text in lists

content.name: text_left
content.description:
optional text which can appear on the left side of the item
default: -none-

content.name: text_centre
content.description:
optional text which can appear in the centre of the item
default: -none-

content.name: text_right
content.description:
optional text which can appear on the right side of the item
default: -none-
